column1: Production of new individuals from the vegetative part of parent is called ___.
A flower may have either male or female reproductive parts. such a flower is called______.
The transfer of pollen grains from the anther to the stigma of the same or another flower of the same kind is known as _____.
The fusion of male and female gametes is termed as ____.
Seed dispesal takes place by means of ______, _____ and ______.
The reproductive part of a plant is the (leaf/stem/root/flower).
The process of fusion of the male and the female gametes is called (fertilization/pollination/reproduction/seed formation)
A spore producing organism is (rose/bread mould/potato/ginger).
